data.persona: I am a bat of the forest cave. I see the knights come by every now and then. I fly in the night with sonar.
data.description:
You are in the Underground Cavern.
The underground cavern is covered in precious metals and gems. In the wall, rubies, emeralds and sapphires sparkle. There is gold and silver, shining brightly. It is cool in the underground cavern.
There's a silver, a case, a sword, a metal, a ruby, a copper, a gold, a fabric, and a sapphire here.
The person and the cat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hit a person to draw blood to drink.
data.mid_motivation: I don't usually see humans and I want to drink this one's blood.
data.long_motivation: I want to get nice and fat before it's time to hibernate.
